Source for file WikiPlotSettings.php

Documentation is available at WikiPlotSettings.php


1     <?php
2     /**
3     * File used to store settings
4     * 
5     * This file, is supposed to be manipulated by the user, it contains settings for WikiPlot. Primarily for the caching functionallity.
6     * 
7     * @package WikiPlot
8     * @author WikiPlot development team.
9     */
10    
11    /**
12    * Path to the cache
13    *
14    * Path to the cache, relative to the DOCUMENT_ROOT.
15    *
16    *@see $CacheURL
17    *@var string Path relative to DOCUMENT_ROOT
18    */
19    define("WikiPlotCachePath","./cache/");
20    
21    /**
22    * URL to cache
23    *
24    * URL to cache directory define in $CachePath.
25    *
26    *@see $CachePath
27    *@var string absolute url
28    */
29    define("WikiPlotCacheURL","http://example.com/cache/");
30    
31    /**
32    * Max Cache Age
33    *
34    * Maximum cache age in days. Delete a file older than...
35    * if 0 Cache never expires.
36    *
37    *@var Integer Cache age in days.
38    */
39    define("WikiPlotCacheAge",0);
40    
41    /**
42    * Max Unused Age
43    *
44    * Maximun unused age before deletion.
45    *
46    *@var Integer Age in days.
47    */
48    define("WikiPlotMaxUnusedAge",14);
49    ?>
Documentation generated on Fri, 13 Oct 2006 06:44:41 +0200 by phpDocumentor 1.3.0RC3
